dcterms:description: A dataset containing 1103 video clips annotated with explanation content, the explanation time interval, and associated measures of the necessity for explanations in various driving scenarios.
dcterms:title: Self-Driving Explanation Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset that provides attention annotations for driving scenarios, used to understand driver attention in critical situations.
dcterms:title: Berkeley Deep Drive Attention Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset containing textual explanations for self-driving vehicle actions, extensively annotated for various driving scenarios.
dcterms:title: Berkeley DeepDrive Explanation Dataset
